episodes.title: Preparation
episodes.plot: Ewan and Charley prepare for their adventure around the globe starting from London. Training courses are in place for a treacherous journey ahead of them.

episodes.title: Shoving Off
episodes.plot: The guys continue making preparations for their trip, heading to Wales for off-road motorcycle training and making last-minute plans.

episodes.title: London to Volgograd
episodes.plot: Further preparations for the trip as the pair settle on which motorbikes to take. The journey begins for the boys here.

episodes.title: Kazakhstan
episodes.plot: A twelve hour nightmare for the two as they have their first visa problems in Prague.

episodes.title: Barnaul to Western Mongolia
episodes.plot: Cutting through part of Russia en route to Mongolia, Ewan and Charley are happy to be on tarmac roads all the way up to Barnaul. The stunning landscape of the Altai region is a pleasant surprise. Once across the Mongolian border they quickly realize how much they will need the good-luck sacred scarf they have been presented with, when they discover Mongolia's distinct 'lack of roads'. Ewan and Charley reach a wide and bridge-less river, uncrossable by bike. The result is that they have to take a major detour round a large lake. Conditions worsen in the barren ...

episodes.title: Western Mongolia to Yakutsk
episodes.plot: Pushing on despite many setbacks, they immerse themselves in the rich culture and their spirits are lifted by the kind people of Mongolia. They know that the Road of Bones lies ahead and will surely test them further.

episodes.title: Yakutsk to Magadan: The Road of Bones
episodes.plot: Pushing on despite many setbacks, they immerse themselves in the rich culture and their spirits are lifted by the kind people of Mongolia. They know that the Road of Bones lies ahead and will surely test them further.

episodes.title: Anchorage to Calgary
episodes.plot: Floods wreak havoc as the pair spend their time team working with their support team to get through the remaining few miles of Russia.

episodes.title: Calgary to New York
episodes.plot: On the final leg of the journey to New York City Ewan McGregor and Charley Boorman are involved in collisions with cars.

episodes.title: One Year Later
episodes.plot: A year after their trip Ewan and Charlie take a look back at their adventure.
